select grade.id, student_id, score, u.name as studentName, c.name as courseName from grade join user u on grade.student_id = u.id join course c on grade.course_id = c.id where grade.teacher_id = ${id} and grade.deleted = 0
and u.name like '%${gradeSelectDto.studentName}%'
and c.name like '%${gradeSelectDto.courseName}%'

select grade.id, grade.teacher_id, score, u.name as teacherName, c.name as courseName from grade join user u on grade.teacher_id = u.id join course c on grade.course_id = c.id where grade.student_id = ${id} and grade.deleted = 0
and u.name like '%${gradeSelectDto.teacherName}%'
and c.name like '%${gradeSelectDto.courseName}%'
select score as value, c.name as name from grade join course as c on course_id = c.id where grade.deleted = 0 and grade.student_id = ${id} order by score desc limit 5;

select c.name as name, SUM(IF(score >= 60, 1, 0)) / COUNT(*) * 100 as value from grade join course as c on grade.course_id = c.id where c.deleted = 0 and grade.teacher_id = ${id} group by course_id
order by value desc
order by value asc
limit 5;
